wiki.text:
'Ides' may refer to:
* Ides (calendar), a day in the Roman calendar that marked the approximate
  middle of the month
:* Specifically, Ides of March
* Ides, a being in Germanic paganism
* Saint Ides, an Irish saint
* St. Ides, a brand of malt liquor, named after the Irish saint; in turn, this
  beverage inspired the songs: ** "St. Ides Heaven", a song by Elliott Smith,
  released on his album [[Elliott Smith (album)]] ** "St. Ides of March", a song
  by Soledad Brothers (band)

'IDES' may mean:
* SAP AG's IDES, Internet Demonstration and Evaluation System
* Intrusion Detection Expert System
wiki.title: ides
